item.description: Let's pray for no rain and enjoy a day on the Ipswich River. We will meet at Foote Brothers canoe rental. You can rent a canoe or bring your own. This is a quiet river with much wildlife. Bring a picnic lunch and we will stop on the shore for a lunch. All levels of skill encouraged to attend. Beginners give canoeing a try it's a lot of fun.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Canoe Trip
